text: illeogalodoe hananim oee neohuiga sungbaehaneun geos-i mueos-inji suggo hayeo boassneunyo geugeosdeul-i daejieseochangjohan geos-i mueos-inji naege boyeo dao animyeon geugeosdeul-i haneul-eul chang joham-e dongchamhayeossdan mal-inyo igeos ijeon-e usang-eul sungbaehala gyesidoen seongseoga issdamyeon naege ileuge hala animyeon neohuiga jinsil-ila handamyeon jisig-ui heunjeog-ilado ileuge hala
